document_data.mainbody:
Barienne was a young lady that lived in Scornubel during the midâ€“14 century DR.
She was described as being exceptionally pretty.
Some time before or during the , Barienne formed a fleeting relationship with the young rogue named Tiep. While the young man traveled from town to town, he hoped that she would wait for his return to her home city so they could resume their relationship where it left off.
